Prerequisite(s): Two Elemental Flux maneuvers
Range: Personal
Target: You
Duration: 1 round

Description

You know that the might of the elements can overwhelm any defense. After initiating this boost, all attacks you make for one round ignore energy resistance of your targets, and creatures with an energy immunity still take half damage, rather than no damage. In addition, all of your attacks deal an additional [[4d6]] points of damage of your active element's associated energy type for the same duration. Animus augmentation: You may spend two points of animus to lower the spell resistance possessed by those damaged by your attacks by 10 for the duration of this boost.
